title: Oktoberfests in Japan
text:
Published: August 14, 2015 
MATSUMOTO SUMMER FEST 2015 - OKTOBERFEST (Nagano prefecture): Aug. 20-31, 5-9 p.m., 11 a.m.-9 p.m. weekends; taste German beers; live music; Hanatokei Koen, neighboring Matsumoto Parco; JR Matsumoto Station; 0263-32-5355. 
KANAZAWA OKTOBERFEST (Ishikawa prefecture): Aug. 28-Sept. 6, 4-9 p.m., 11 a.m.-9 p.m. weekends; taste German beers; live music performance by Woho Kalendar Band from Germany 6 & 7:30 p.m. weekdays, 1, 3, 5 & 7 p.m. weekends; Ishikawa Shikou Kinen Koen, one-minute walk from Korinbo Bus Stop after taking a bus from JR Kanagawa Station; Hokutetsu Bus; 076-262-1717. 
KUMAMOTO OKTOBERFEST (Kumamoto prefecture): Aug. 28-Sept. 6, 4-10 p.m., 11 a.m.-10 p.m. weekends; taste 30 varieties of German beers; live music; Hanabatake Hiroba and Kawashima Koen, one-minute walk from Hanabatake Station after taking a street car from Kumamoto Station-mae; 096-382-4451. 
NIKKO OKTOBERFEST (Tochigi prefecture): Sept. 4, 3-9 p.m. & Sept. 5-13, noon-9 p.m.; German beers and live music; Nikko Kaido Nico Nico Honjin, five-minute walk from Shimoimaichi Station on Tobu Nikko Line; 0288-21-5136 or 03-5777-0678. 
HIROSHIMA OKTOBERFEST (Hiroshima prefecture): Sept. 11-23, 3-9 p.m. weekdays, 11 a.m.-9 p.m. weekends; taste varieties of German beers; live music; ex-Hiroshima Citizensâ€™ Ball Park; get off at Genbaku Dome-mae stop after taking a street car from JR Hiroshima Station; 082-249-1218. 
BELGIUM BEER WEEKEND (Tokyo): Sept. 15-23, 2-10 p.m. weekdays. 11 a.m.-10 p.m. weekends; taste Belgium beers at Roppongi Hills Arena, Roppongi Station on Hibiya Line; 3,000 yen includes 11 drink-coins and a beer glass; 03-5829-6878. Join the conversation and share your voice. 
Show Comments
